meanings.definition: A decorative motif resembling a palm leaf or fan, often used in art and architecture.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted beautiful palmettes on the ceiling of the cathedral.
meanings.sent2: The palmettes on the vase added an elegant touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal one of the palmettes from the painting.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was adorned with palmettes that seemed to dance in the light.
meanings.sent5: The intricate palmettes carved into the wooden frame made it a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A type of plant with fan-shaped leaves, typically found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with lush palmettes swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of palmettes growing near the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to climb one of the tall palmettes but failed.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back like the leaves of a palmette.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the palmettes brightened up the entire garden.
